metadata.name: Kubernetes Deployment & Scaling
metadata.description: Production-grade Kubernetes deployment with auto-scaling, health checks, monitoring, and zero-downtime updates.

steps.action: Design Kubernetes manifests: Deployments, Services, Ingress, ConfigMaps
Configure CI/CD pipeline with automated testing and deployment
Implement horizontal pod autoscaling (HPA) based on metrics
Configure network policies, RBAC, and secrets management
Set up Prometheus monitoring and Grafana dashboards
Implement rolling updates with health checks and readiness probes
Test failover scenarios and disaster recovery procedures

benefits: Automatic scaling based on CPU/memory/custom metrics
Secure by default with network policies and RBAC

prerequisites: Kubernetes cluster access (EKS, GKE, or AKS)
Docker images built and pushed to registry
